subject: Baseball
Therapy and Rehabilitation
lead_paragraph: Fresh off a rehab stint in the minors, John Smoltz will return to the Atlanta Braves’ bullpen and reprise the role he had from 2001 to 2004.
snippet: Fresh off a rehab stint in the minors, John Smoltz will return to the Atlanta Braves’ bullpen and reprise the role he had from 2001 to 2004.
